title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open in a different editor, nothing happens. The scripted resource editor example is reactivated instead.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open in a different editor, a new editor should be opened on the file based on the selected editor type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file named test.xml.
4. Select the test.xml file in the Navigator.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Observe that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is reactivated.

Note: Searching for an existing open file should consider editor types and open a new editor on the file when the editor type is different.
